ScribbleScape
Making beautiful games

Portfolio

About

ScribbleScape is a tiny indie studio making beautiful experimental games. It was awarded UK Games Funding in 2020, was part of Elevate 2020 and then part of the Games London Accelerator in 2021.

ScribbleScape is run by Caroline, who was awarded a place as an Astra Fellow in 2023. She is currently working on her unannounced Astra project and alongside Queensguard on Shards Between Us.

Around the Web

Cracks

Cracks is a relationship platformer about a relationship gone wrong. Cracks came out of Castle Jam 2018, where we won Best Story and Best Overall Game. In 2020, we were awarded funding from UK Games Fund, and were a finalist for UK Game of the Show, and were part of the Elevate 2020 cohort, the GDC relief fund accelerator.

  • Date: 2020 - 2022

Shards Between Us

Shards Between Us is a narrative puzzle game made with the Queensguard team. Two magical sisters reunite after their mother's funeral, and must overcome their differences in order to escape the crumbling palace.

  • Date: 2023 - Today
